hero.description: I'm here to help bring your ideas to life. Choose your preferred way to connect, and I'll get back to you promptly.

responseTime.title: Response Time
responseTime.subtitle: I prioritize quick and helpful responses

whyMe.title: Why Work With Me?
whyMe.subtitle: What you can expect from our collaboration

items.title: Quality First
items.description: Clean, maintainable code following best practices

items.title: Clear Communication
items.description: Regular updates and transparent progress tracking

items.question: What types of projects do you work on?
items.answer: I specialize in full-stack web development, including e-commerce platforms, business management systems, mobile applications, and custom web solutions. I work with both startups and established companies.

items.question: Do you work remotely?
items.answer: Yes, I primarily work remotely and have experience collaborating with international teams. I'm available for both remote and on-site projects depending on requirements.

items.question: What's your typical project timeline?
items.answer: Project timelines vary depending on complexity. Small projects typically take 2-4 weeks, medium projects 1-3 months, and large projects 3-6 months. I always provide detailed timelines during project planning.

items.question: Do you provide ongoing support?
items.answer: Yes, I offer ongoing maintenance, updates, and support for all projects I develop. I can also provide training and documentation to help your team manage the system.

cta.title: Let's Build Something Amazing Together
cta.description: Ready to take the next step? Choose how you'd like to connect and let's discuss your project.
